## Logistics

{{< fa bullhorn >}} To work the `jupyter` notebooks, install `python 3`, 
and modules related to `jupyter`: `jupyter-cache`, `jupyter_client`,
`jupyter_core`, `jupyterlab_widgets` (this induces the installation of dependencies).

<https://jupyter.org>

Download the jupyter notebooks from  [notebooks listings](/notebooks-listings.qmd). 

{{< fa bullhorn >}} If you do not already have an ENT account, follow instructions on  [Moodle](https://moodle.u-paris.fr/course/view.php?id=28534) to get  one. You shall need this account to connect to  PostGres cluster.
